name: Intrusive Memory Podcasts
overview: A curated collection of literary, philosophical, and narrative podcasts produced by Intrusive Memory. Features classic literature adaptations, philosophical meditations, and original fiction series.

podcasts.name: Daily Dao - Tao De Jing Podcast
podcasts.summary: Daily readings from the Tao De Jing, exploring the nature of the Tao and the art of living in harmony.
podcasts.description: A contemplative journey through the 81 chapters of the Tao De Jing, the ancient Chinese philosophical text attributed to Laozi. Each episode presents one chapter with poetic rendering, contemplative commentary, and traditional translation.
podcasts.author: Tom Stovall

seasons.name: The Tao Ching & The De Ching

podcasts.name: Meditations
podcasts.summary: Daily readings from Marcus Aurelius' Meditations, the personal writings of the Roman Emperor and Stoic philosopher.
podcasts.description: A year-long journey through the Meditations of Marcus Aurelius. Each episode presents one day's reading from this foundational Stoic text, offering timeless wisdom on virtue, duty, and the art of living.
podcasts.author: Marcus Aurelius

podcasts.name: The Life of Lazarillo de Tormes
podcasts.summary: A modern English translation of the anonymous 16th-century Spanish picaresque novel.
podcasts.description: La Vida de Lazarillo de Tormes - the anonymous Spanish picaresque novel that follows a young boy's journey through service to various masters in Renaissance Spain. A satirical look at Spanish society through the eyes of a clever survivor.
podcasts.author: Anonymous

podcasts.name: You're Nobody til Somebody Wants You Dead
podcasts.summary: An anthological picaresque exploring identity and mortality through unlikable characters in a noir world.
podcasts.description: An anthological picaresque exploring identity and mortality through the eyes of rogues, outcasts, and anti-heroes in a noir world where you're nobody until somebody wants you dead.
podcasts.author: Tom Stovall

podcasts.name: Therapist GPT
podcasts.summary: Part therapist, part journal, part confession: This is a look at a programming job in the evolving world of AI. Thoughts, cares, feelings, it's all a big mess. This is where we embrace the big mess.
podcasts.description: Part therapist, part journal, part confession: This is a look at a programming job in the evolving world of AI. Thoughts, cares, feelings, it's all a big mess. This is where we embrace the big mess.
podcasts.author: Tom Stovall

podcasts.name: Podcast Mr Mr Charles
podcasts.description: A comedy podcast series featuring original characters and humorous storytelling.
podcasts.author: Unknown

podcasts.name: Casting Software Spells
podcasts.summary: Supernatural Code Craft - exploring the mystical art of software development through agentic incantation.
podcasts.description: A podcast exploring the mystical art of software development through agentic incantation, where code becomes spell-craft and developers become modern-day wizards. Each episode reveals the spells, rituals, and arcane knowledge for building, running and transforming software with AI-powered automation.
podcasts.author: Tom Stovall
